                       The most modest of sums, but that's all you need to
                  drive away a brand new Nova.
                       That's because, at present, we've a somewhat special
                  package of low-cost finance schemes on offer.
                       For example, with just a £99 deposit and repayments
                  spread over four years (15.2% APR) you could soon be sitting
                  comfortably in a new driving position.

                       And with a 14 model range (from the Nova 1.0 to the high
                  performance 1.6 GTE) you'll surely find you're spoilt for choice.

                  versions and all come ready to run on money-saving unleaded
                  petrol as well as ordinary petrol.

                  soon. Then you'll have the full low down.

                                                                 demand for our foot­

               microwave oven that uses up a lot of it can make life
                                                                                                                                                           cook a 141b turkey. When the door opens, the controls
                                                                                                                                                           come with it. Which means that you save kitchen space
               pretty difficult.                                                                                                                           without losing cooking space. And you can still be
                  Which is why Toshiba came up with the Surfatouch                                                                                         generous with your helpings.
               microwave       oven.           Because Toshiba                                             have          put the                                  Toshiba are being pretty generous with helping you
              Surfatouch controls on the door instead of on the side.                                                                                      as well. They're offering ten months interest-free credit
              Creating a new slimline microwave that takes up less                                                                                         on Surfatouch microwaves from 6th April 1989. (And you
              space where you need it most - on your worksurface.                                                                                          can phone 0898 332200 for brochures).

                                                                                          FLEXIBLE,
                                                                                         OFFER YOU
                                                                                        UP TO
                                                                                              DAYS                     ( 1 INTEREST WHATSOEVER.)

                                                                       Funnily enough, this is what- makes Access so interesting.
                                                     Between the day you use your Access card and the day you g e t your
                                                                                     statement, nothing happens. For up to 31 days.
                                                                                                            All w e do is to t up your bills.
                                                                             And, unless it's a cash w ith d ra w a l, w e d o n 't charge
                                                       you a penny interest on w h a t you've spent since your last statement.
                                                 Then w e give you another 25 days to d e cid e how much to pay us back.
                                                      Either pay the lot. a minimum amount, or anything in between.
                                                                                       Now w h o said your flexible friend is boring?

look over a flat was jailed for six years yesterday.

                                                                                                                                                                          It may well be some time since you were asked to do
                                                                                                                                                                   your tables, but never fear, with our new finance offers it
                                                                                                                                                                   couldn’t be easier. Quite simply, it all adds up.
                                                                            I lii S i P i
                                                                            lllllillllll                                                                                  Choose from four flexible methods of payment,
                                                                            iW H alM lllM i
                                                                                                                                                                   including low deposit options with up to 4 years to pay,
                                                                                                                                                                   or 0% interest, over either 1 or 2 years.
                                                                                                                                                                          Then all you have to do is choose your new
                                                                                                                                                                   Renault 5. However, with no less than 16 different models
                                                                                                                                                                   from the Campus to the GT Turbo, and prices from £5,205
                                                                                                                                                                   to £9,350,* this may take a little longer to work out.
                                                                                                                                                                          Visit your local dealer or ’phone 0800 400 415 (24 hrs/
                                                                                                                                                                   free) for written credit details. All Renault cars have
                                                                                                                                                                   12 months unlimited mileage warranty with free RAC
                                                                                                                                                                   membership, plus a 6 year anti-perforation warranty.

                                                                 Issue, ask for the Savings Certificate
                                                                 Repayment/Reinvestment form (DNS
                                                                 502MA) at your post office or bank. Fill
                                                                 in the form and apply for reinvestment.
                                                                 Then send it to the Savings Certificate
                                                                 Office, Durham, along with the
                                                                 certificates you wish to reinvest.
                                                                     If you wish to buy Capital Bonds
                                                                 ask for the same form and apply
                                                                 for re p a y m e n t. When you get your
                                                                 repayment, go to your post office and
                                                                 ask them for the prospectus and
                                                                 purchase form to buy your new Capital
                                                                 Bonds. If you need more information
                                                                 call us on 0253 79 3090 during office
                                                                 hours. Don’t miss out.

Advice from Marjorie                                                                                                                                                                                                           Y e s te rd a y ’s s o lu tio n :
Orr on how to enjoy personal relationships is just a phone call away. All

the numbers are 0 8 9 8 300. For example, for Leo call 0 8 9 8 3 0 0 484;
Virgo 0898 3 0 0 485 etc. Calls are charged at 25p for one minute
{cheap rate} and 38p for one minute at other times {including VAT}.

                                                                                                         THE FIRST STEP MORTGAGE


                              T h ere’s no feeling like th e feeling you get                                                                           w an t to buy fu rn itu re, o r carpets, o r decoration,
               w hen you first open th e door to you r new hom e.                                                                                      o r even a nice housew arm ing Hi-Fi.
                              T reasure it. Savour it.                                                                                                               O u r First Step M ortgage is a case in point.
                              Because if you haven’t sorted o u t th e right                                                                           W hile m o st m ortgages have to be repaid over a
               m o rtg a g e , it c o u ld be th e                                                                                                                                                             p eriod o f 25 years, First Step
               la st g o o d fe e lin g yo u g e t                                                                                                                                                             allows you u p to 40 years.
               for an awfully long tim e.                                                                                                                                                                                   T hat m eans, naturally
                              However, if you com e                                                                                                                                                            enough, th a t your m onthly
               in to any branch o f Halifax                                                                                                                                                                    outgoings are smaller.
               Building Society you ’ll find                                                                                                                                                                                W h ich leaves you w ith
               o u r Easy S ta rt M ortgages                                                                                                                                                                   a little e x tra ca sh fo r th e
               w ill allow you to do m o re                                                                                                                                                                    odd m eal o u t, o r whatever.
               th a n m erely exist in your                                                                                                                                                                                 For f u r th e r details o f
               new hom e.                                                                                                                                                                                     this and all o u r o th e r Easy

                                                                                                                              HALIFAX
YOUR PROPERTY AND ASUITABLE ENDOWMENT POLICY OR PENSION PLAN ARRANGED BY THE SOCIETY ARE SECURITY FOR A LOAN. YOU MUST INVEST AN AMOUNT EQUALTO 5 % OF THE PURCHASE PRICE WITH THE SOCIETY. THE SOCIETY WILL TAKE A CHARGE OVER THIS ACCOUNT WHICH WILL BE RE-USED TO REDUCE THE MONTHLY REPAYMENTS
                                          OVER 3 YEARS. FOR WRITTEN DETAILS CONTACT YOUR LOCAL OFFICE OR WRITE TO HALIFAX BUILDING SOCIETY, TRINITY ROAD, HALIFAX, WEST YORKSHIRE HX1 2RG. REGULATED INTHE CONDUCT OF INVESTMENT BUSINESS BY S.I.B .

 By MALCOLM FOLLEY

                                                                                                                            to get Andrew
h a s r e m in d e d th e

  the centre of a selec­
